sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState } from "react" const CartPage = () => { // Sample cart items - in real app, this would come from props or context const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Traditional Thali", description: "Rice + Sambar + Rasam + 2 Vegetables + Curd + Pickle + Papad", price: 150, quantity: 2, category: "South Indian Meals", }, { id: 12, name: "Veg Fried Rice Combo", description: "Veg Fried Rice + Manchurian + Spring Roll + Soup", price: 170, quantity: 1, category: "Chinese Food", }, { id: 22, name: "Fresh Lime Soda", description: "Fresh Lime + Soda + Mint + Salt/Sugar + Ice", price: 40, quantity: 3, category: "Drinks and Beverages", }, ]) const [customerInfo, setCustomerInfo] = useState({ name: "", studentId: "", phone: "", email: "", }) const [showBill, setShowBill] = useState(false) const [orderPlaced, setOrderPlaced] = useState(false) // Calculate totals const subtotal = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.price * item.quantity, 0) const tax = Math.round(subtotal * 0.05) // 5% tax const deliveryCharge = subtotal > 200 ? 0 : 20 // Free delivery above ₹200 const total = subtotal + tax + deliveryCharge const handleQuantityChange = (id, change) => { setCartItems( cartItems .map((item) => { if (item.id === id) { const newQuantity = Math.max(0, item.quantity + change) return newQuantity === 0 ? null : { ...item, quantity: newQuantity } } return item }) .filter(Boolean), ) } const handleRemoveItem = (id) => { setCartItems(cartItems.filter((item) => item.id !== id)) } const handleInputChange = (e) => { setCustomerInfo({ ...customerInfo, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } const handlePlaceOrder = () => { if (!customerInfo.name || !customerInfo.studentId || !customerInfo.phone) { alert("Please fill in all required fields!") return } setShowBill(true) } const handleConfirmOrder = () => { setOrderPlaced(true) setTimeout(() => { alert("Order confirmed! You will receive a confirmation SMS shortly.") }, 1000) } const handleBackToMenu = () => { // Navigate back to food menu - you can replace this with your routing logic // For React Router: navigate('/food') // For now, we'll use a simple approach window.history.back() } const generateBillNumber = () => { return `DSCE${Date.now().toString().slice(-6)}` } const getCurrentDateTime = () => { return new Date().toLocaleString("en-IN", { timeZone: "Asia/Kolkata", year: "numeric", month: "2-digit", day: "2-digit", hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit", second: "2-digit", }) } const styles = { container: { minHeight: "100vh", background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #0f172a, #1e293b)", fontFamily: "system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif", color: "white", }, header: { background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6, #10b981)", padding: "1rem", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "space-between", boxShadow: "0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)", position: "sticky", top: 0, zIndex: 50, }, backButton: { background: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)", border: "none", borderRadius: "50%", width: "40px", height: "40px", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", cursor: "pointer", color: "white", fontSize: "1.25rem", transition: "all 0.3s ease", }, headerTitle: { fontSize: "1.5rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "white", margin: 0, }, cartCount: { background: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)", borderRadius: "50%", width: "40px", height: "40px", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", fontSize: "1rem", fontWeight: "bold", }, mainContent: { padding: "2rem", maxWidth: "1200px", margin: "0 auto", }, cartSection: { background: "rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8)", backdropFilter: "blur(12px)", borderRadius: "1rem", padding: "2rem", border: "1px solid #475569", marginBottom: "2rem", }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: "1.5rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "#60a5fa", marginBottom: "1.5rem", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "0.5rem", }, cartItem: { background: "rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.8)", borderRadius: "0.75rem", padding: "1.5rem", marginBottom: "1rem", border: "1px solid #334155", display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", }, itemDetails: { flex: 1, }, itemName: { fontSize: "1.25rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "white", marginBottom: "0.5rem", }, itemDescription: { color: "#cbd5e1", fontSize: "0.9rem", marginBottom: "0.5rem", }, itemCategory: { color: "#60a5fa", fontSize: "0.8rem", fontWeight: 500, }, itemControls: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "1rem", }, quantityControls: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "0.5rem", background: "rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.2)", borderRadius: "2rem", padding: "0.5rem", }, quantityButton: { background: "#3b82f6", border: "none", borderRadius: "50%", width: "30px", height: "30px", color: "white", cursor: "pointer", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", fontSize: "1rem", fontWeight: "bold", }, quantity: { minWidth: "30px", textAlign: "center", fontWeight: "bold", color: "white", }, itemPrice: { fontSize: "1.25rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "#10b981", minWidth: "80px", textAlign: "right", }, removeButton: { background: "#ef4444", border: "none", borderRadius: "0.5rem", padding: "0.5rem 1rem", color: "white", cursor: "pointer", fontSize: "0.9rem", transition: "all 0.3s ease", }, customerForm: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr))", gap: "1rem", marginBottom: "2rem", }, inputGroup: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: "0.5rem", }, inputLabel: { color: "#cbd5e1", fontSize: "0.9rem", fontWeight: 500, }, inputField: { background: "rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.8)", border: "1px solid #475569", borderRadius: "0.5rem", padding: "0.75rem", color: "white", fontSize: "1rem", transition: "all 0.3s ease", outline: "none", }, billSummary: { background: "rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.9)", borderRadius: "0.75rem", padding: "1.5rem", border: "1px solid #334155", }, billRow: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", padding: "0.5rem 0", borderBottom: "1px solid #334155", }, billRowTotal: { borderBottom: "2px solid #60a5fa", fontSize: "1.25rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "#60a5fa", }, placeOrderButton: { background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981, #059669)", border: "none", borderRadius: "2rem", padding: "1rem 2rem", color: "white", fontSize: "1.125rem", fontWeight: "bold", cursor: "pointer", transition: "all 0.3s ease", width: "100%", marginTop: "1rem", textTransform: "uppercase", letterSpacing: "0.05em", }, billModal: { position: "fixed", top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, background: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)", zIndex: 100, display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", padding: "1rem", }, billContent: { background: "white", color: "black", borderRadius: "1rem", padding: "2rem", maxWidth: "500px", width: "100%", maxHeight: "80vh", overflowY: "auto", }, billHeader: { textAlign: "center", marginBottom: "2rem", borderBottom: "2px solid #e5e7eb", paddingBottom: "1rem", }, collegeName: { fontSize: "1.5rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "#1f2937", marginBottom: "0.5rem", }, billTitle: { fontSize: "1.25rem", color: "#374151", marginBottom: "0.5rem", }, billNumber: { fontSize: "1rem", color: "#6b7280", }, billSection: { marginBottom: "1.5rem", }, billSectionTitle: { fontSize: "1.1rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "#374151", marginBottom: "0.5rem", borderBottom: "1px solid #e5e7eb", paddingBottom: "0.25rem", }, billItemRow: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", padding: "0.5rem 0", fontSize: "0.9rem", }, billTotal: { borderTop: "2px solid #374151", paddingTop: "1rem", marginTop: "1rem", }, billTotalRow: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", fontSize: "1.25rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "#1f2937", }, billButtons: { display: "flex", gap: "1rem", marginTop: "2rem", }, confirmButton: { background: "#10b981", border: "none", borderRadius: "0.5rem", padding: "0.75rem 1.5rem", color: "white", fontSize: "1rem", fontWeight: "bold", cursor: "pointer", flex: 1, }, cancelButton: { background: "#6b7280", border: "none", borderRadius: "0.5rem", padding: "0.75rem 1.5rem", color: "white", fontSize: "1rem", fontWeight: "bold", cursor: "pointer", flex: 1, }, emptyCart: { textAlign: "center", padding: "3rem", color: "#94a3b8", }, emptyCartIcon: { fontSize: "4rem", marginBottom: "1rem", }, emptyCartText: { fontSize: "1.25rem", marginBottom: "1rem", }, backToMenuButton: { background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6, #1d4ed8)", border: "none", borderRadius: "2rem", padding: "0.75rem 1.5rem", color: "white", fontSize: "1rem", fontWeight: "bold", cursor: "pointer", transition: "all 0.3s ease", }, successMessage: { background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981, #059669)", borderRadius: "1rem", padding: "2rem", textAlign: "center", marginTop: "2rem", }, successIcon: { fontSize: "3rem", marginBottom: "1rem", }, successText: { fontSize: "1.25rem", fontWeight: "bold", marginBottom: "0.5rem", }, successSubtext: { color: "#d1fae5", fontSize: "1rem", }, } if (orderPlaced) { return (

Order Confirmed

✓
🎉
Order Placed Successfully!
Your order #{generateBillNumber()} has been confirmed.
Estimated delivery time: 20-30 minutes
) } return (
{/* Header */}

Your Cart

{cartItems.length}
{cartItems.length === 0 ? (
🛒
Your cart is empty

Add some delicious items from our menu!

) : ( <> {/* Cart Items */}

🍽️ Order Items ({cartItems.length})

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.name}
{item.description}
{item.category}
{item.quantity}
₹{item.price * item.quantity}/-
))}
{/* Customer Information */}

👤 Customer Information

{/* Bill Summary */}

💰 Bill Summary

Subtotal ({cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0)} items) ₹{subtotal}/-
GST (5%) ₹{tax}/-
Delivery Charges {deliveryCharge === 0 ? "FREE" : `₹${deliveryCharge}/-`}
Total Amount ₹{total}/-
)}
{/* Bill Modal */} {showBill && (
DAYANANDA SAGAR COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING
FOOD COURT BILL
Bill No: {generateBillNumber()}
Date & Time: {getCurrentDateTime()}
Customer Details
Name: {customerInfo.name}
Student ID: {customerInfo.studentId}
Phone: {customerInfo.phone}
{customerInfo.email && (
Email: {customerInfo.email}
)}
Order Details
{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.name}
{item.quantity} × ₹{item.price} ₹{item.price * item.quantity}/-
))}
Subtotal: ₹{subtotal}/-
GST (5%): ₹{tax}/-
Delivery: {deliveryCharge === 0 ? "FREE" : `₹${deliveryCharge}/-`}
TOTAL: ₹{total}/-
)}
) } export default CartPage
